# 0.54.0

## Bzlmod

```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_rust", version = "0.54.0")
```

## WORKSPACE

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    integrity = "sha256-e46nr3+xbcSiMitKC3yeH6BUtNv59tBYTkO+f3zGqWs=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.54.0/rules_rust-v0.54.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Fix fuchsia platform triple by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2945
* Make crate module extension os and arch dependent by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2939
* add a Source::parse arm for sparse repos (keeping it in the scheme). … by @sthornington in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2950
* Added Rust 1.82.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2944
* Updated Bazelmod cross compilation to catch MacOS sys dependency issues by @marvin-hansen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2926
* Pin to Bazel 7.3.2 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2957
* Flipped `incompatible_runfiles_cargo_manifest_dir` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2948
* Remove duplicate build metadata depset by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2954
* Add per-target link flags in the right place by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2963
* rust_test(crate=foo) inherits foo.aliases by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2965
* Add support for wasm32-wasip1 target. by @PiotrSikora in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2967
* Make toolchain vars available but don't automatically set them by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2969
* Bring back splicing_config for crate_universe module extension by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2971
* feat: add an attr to rust_binary for customization of the binary name by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2970
* Add aliases attribute to rust tag class. by @sputt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2975
* Made `cargo_build_script` `streams` output group optional. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2976
* A rust_test_suite(srcs=[]) should be empty. by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2966
* Remove dependency on spectral by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2964
* Remove tera optional features by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2984
* Fix annotations' crate.select for lists by @nmattia in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2981
* Stop using config.string(allow_multiple = True) by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2983
* Remove duplication of rustc_flags introduced in 4e593b6cc3e1dab by @sam-mccall in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2987
* Added utility library for parsing workspace status stamps. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2982
* Added `cargo_config` attribute to `cargo_bootstrap_repository`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2986
* Release 0.54.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2979

## New Contributors
* @sthornington made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2950
* @sam-mccall made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2965
* @sputt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2975

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.53.0...0.54.0

## What's Changed
* Add target specific rustc_flags last to the command line by @erenon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2927
* cargo_build_script: add some tests for the cc_args_and_env processing by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2931
* Update `BUILD.bazel` location by @emmanuel-ferdman in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2937
* Update wasm_bindgen to non-deprecated rules_js API by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2934
* cargo_build_script: Add support for `-fsanitize-ignorelist=` by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2935
* cargo_build_script: Add regression test for revert #2925 by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2936
* [Prost] Remove extra generated modules and opt-in to transitively including deps by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2943
* gen_rust_project: optimize aquery with many targets by @TheLortex in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2941
* Release version 53.0 by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2949

## New Contributors
* @erenon made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2927
* @emmanuel-ferdman made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2937
* @TheLortex made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2941

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.52.2...0.53.0


Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Allowlist more clang flags in bindgen by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2902
* Allow `+` in repo names by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2908
* Added utility for parsing action Args param files by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2897
* Updated platform triple mapping to support T3 platforms without `std`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2899
* Fix `override_targets` keys in docs by @max-heller in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2905
* Use absolute path with "-fsanitize-ignorelist" by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2911
* Fix platform validation for wasm32-wasip1 target by @c16a in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2894
* Update `cargo_build_script` to always render custom runfiles dirs. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2891
* Check target tags before ignore tags for lint/fmt aspects by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2913
* Get rolling releases CI green by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2916
* Avoid uses of shell to improve Windows tests by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2912
* Prep release 0.52.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2910

* @vitalybuka made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2911
* @c16a made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2894

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.51.0...0.52.0

# 0.51.0

## Bzlmod

```python
bazel_dep(name = "rules_rust", version = "0.51.0")
```

## WORKSPACE

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    integrity = "sha256-BCrPtzRpstGEj+FI2Bw0IsYepHqeGQDxyew29R6OcZM=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.51.0/rules_rust-v0.51.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Promote experimental_toolchain_generated_sysroot to non-experimental by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2849
* Propagate `cargo_build_script.data` to `Rustc` compile actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2856
* Build `rust_test` targets using a crate name different from the underlying lib by @felipeamp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2828
* Allow `crates_vendor` to read the `CARGO_BAZEL_DEBUG` env var by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2862
* crate_universe: Don't preform path translation on `out_dir` by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2844
* Allow bzlmod users to inhibit toolchain registration by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2819
* Add wasm64 support. by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2866
* Update crate_universe to determine dep+feature trees per host by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2877
* Added tests for `runfiles::parse_repo_mapping` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2869
* Move all settings flags into `//rust/settings` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2870
* Update bindgen version to 0.70.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2872
* Fix runfiles creation for directory based runfiles. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2883
* crate_universe release 0.15.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2880
* Update `cargo_build_script` to work without runfiles support. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2871
* Revert "Update `cargo_build_script` to work without runfiles support (#2871)" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2885
* Fix keyword handling in prost wrapper by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2888
* Improved various tests to be more compatible on Windows by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2886
* Document upstream tooling wrappers by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2890
* Update `cargo_build_script` to work without runfiles support. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2887
* Release 0.51.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2881

## New Contributors
* @purkhusid made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2888

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.50.1...0.51.0


Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Delete `incompatible_no_rustc_sysroot_env` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2790
* Use `target_flag_value` instead of `target_triple.str` by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2793
* Ensure proto compiler attribute is consistent in prost_toolchain by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2794
* Remove deprecated variables from `repositories.bzl` macros by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2795
* Restored bzlmod documentation.  by @marvin-hansen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2798
* Build `rust_test` targets using a crate name different from the underlying lib by @felipeamp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2803
* Update Prost (proto) dependencies to latest versions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2810
* Added `env_inherit` attribute to `rust_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2809
* Revert "Build rust_test targets using a crate name different from the underlying lib" by @felipeamp in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2815
* Use `crate_name` to also match `crate_root`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2824
* Moved `cargo_dep_env` into it's own file. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2823
* Doc: update outdated parameter `output_diagnostics` by @LiXuanqi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2813
* Update min bazel version by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2812
* Flip `experimental_use_coverage_metadata_files` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2830
* Consistently thread extra target constraints around by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2829
* Updated docs to use mdbook by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2834
* Add s390x arch support by @Repana-Chowdappa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2616
* rustdoc_test: Apply prefix stripping to proc_macro dependencies. by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1952
* Minor improvements to documentation. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2846
* Updated fetch_shas utility to use the channel manifest tomls by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2840
* Support emitting debug logs in rules_rust process wrapper. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2845
* Prune `known_shas.bzl` to only include versions used in BazelCI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2850
* Avoid double building `cargo_build_script.data` targets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2826
* Use fake.rs not /dev/null as fake source file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2851
* Moved crate_universe `TreeResolver` into it's own file. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2852
* Error on absolute src paths by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2853
* Improve crate_universe debug logging for `cargo tree` parsing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2854
* Added Rust 1.81.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2841
* Update `runfiles::rlocation!` to return `Option` instead of panicing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2847
* Release 0.50.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2835

## New Contributors
* @felipeamp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2803
* @LiXuanqi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2813
* @Repana-Chowdappa made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2616

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.49.3...0.50.0

## What's Changed
* fix: default rustfmt version to supplied rust version by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2660

* Fix cargo_build_script executables. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2675
* crate_universe: Don't include crate name in build script path. by @criemen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2663

* Add support for override_target when using bzlmod by @AmeliasCode in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2683
* Release 0.46.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2686

## What's Changed
* Switch from `sha256` to `integrity` in release notes by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2389

* Replaced multiple usages of `String` with `Label`. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2363
* Fix missing .wasm output for rust_wasm_bindgen by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2396
* Stringify annotation labels by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2394
* Fix name of toolchain repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2395
* Advertise CcInfo provider on rules by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2126
* Add test for query and cquery in the repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2398
* Change default Rust distribution downloads from .tar.gz to .tar.xz by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2399
* Add annotation support for transient crates. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2392
* Allow `RustBindgen` action to get `--gcc-toolchain` from cc toolchains by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2400
* Minor cleanup of prost rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2397
* Fix the patch_tool annotation. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2404
* Fix #2402: use `get_lib_name_default(lib)` instead of `lib.owner.name`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2405
* Fix #2406: use codegen option `link-args` to forward `user_link_flags` in bindgen. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2407
* Nix Example updated `rules_nixpkgs` version and removed CI workaround. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2409
* Prep for 0.37.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2403
* Use # not / as a sed escape character by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2412
* Drop import macro by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2411
* Fix rustfmt toolchains when consuming rules_rust with bzlmod. by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2410
* Provide a better error message when trying to generate rust-project.json by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2196
* Update android example to use Starlark version of android_ndk_repository by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2417
* Allow ~ in repository names by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2427
* Prepare rust rules for Starlark CcToolchainInfo. by @buildbreaker2021 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2424
* Update rules_apple by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2436
* Prep 0.38.0 release by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2437
